name: A Plague Tale: Innocence

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/A Plague Tale Innocence/Launch A Plague Tale - Innocence.lnk

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/A Plague Tale Innocence/Launch A Plague Tale - Innocence.lnk
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /DIR="C:/GOG Games/A Plague Tale
      Innocence"
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
